content: The patient reports persistent soft tissue swelling of the hand that becomes more noticeable with activity and is questioning its normalcy. She notes that sensation has markedly improved; she experienced hypersensitivity two weeks ago and the week prior, which has significantly lessened over the past week.
title: HPI Spencer

content: On exam incision , well healed , very minimal scar , no um firmness to the scar . Excellent range of motion , full tight fist without pain , um , able to get hand flat on the table , there is a very slight extension lag , um , less than 5 degrees when compared to her baseline . Uh , hyperextension , uh , sensation decreased but improving to the on one of the digit
title: Musculoskeletal

content: wean splint advanced activity , advanced range of motion , return to clinic in 3 months for follow-up
title: Plan
